Key Match Events: Ja Morant scored 27 points but struggled in the final period, scoring only 2 points.
Morant was subbed out with nine minutes left in the fourth quarter and re-entered with three minutes left.
Desmond Bane's game-tying shot was waved off because coach Taylor Jenkins called a timeout before the release.
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins spoke on his decision to bench Morant for a good chunk of the fourth quarter, citing the need for players coming back from injury to find a rhythm.
Jenkins admitted his costly mistake of calling a timeout before Bane's game-tying shot.
